name: The Golden Ticket
description:
You leave your hometown in search of satisfying the everlasting nudging feeling that compelled you to do so. The lands awaiting you are harsh and unforgiving for most, but you have curiosity on your side. Discover planets long lost, and yourself.

Something tells you the answers lay at the very top, if one could just keep climbing...

Instructions:

The game is played by two players splitting up a single keyboard. One controlling their character by W, A, S D and the second one with the arrow keys. The goal of the game is to get to the top before your partner does. There are puzzles and obstacles in the way that require more of quick thinking and reactions than a strategic planning. Along the way numerous shooting mechanics are introduced that differently affect your environment, so watch out carefully to what they do and adapt quickly!

Unfortunately, the game is not finished. :( Far from it. But we had fun, and it was a great experience, especially since it was my first Game Jam. :) – Radovan Sekulič

It was great experience to work with you guys. - David Truhlář

https://darkcash.itch.io/

It was fun, and I'm looking forward to the next year, when it hopefully will take place physically. ;) - Vít Dvořák

Return the snow to Czech, global Warming ! :( - José Martins https://jose-martinstm.itch.io/ 

Game made by:

José Martins, Vít Dvořák, David Truhlář and Radovan Sekulič.

based on rules of GDS Game Jam on the topic of "The First Contact with an Unknown Intelligence."

Enjoy! :)
